Body:
from lasagne.layers import LocallyConnected2DLayer
input_layer = DummyInputLayer((10, 2, 4, 4))
with pytest.raises(ValueError) as exc:
    LocallyConnected2DLayer(input_layer, 4, 3, channelwise=True)
assert 'num_filters and the number of input channels should match' in exc.value.args[
    0]
input_layer = DummyInputLayer((10, 2, None, 4))
with pytest.raises(ValueError) as exc:
    LocallyConnected2DLayer(input_layer, 4, 3, channelwise=True)
assert 'A LocallyConnected2DLayer requires a fixed input shape (except for the batch size)' in exc.value.args[
    0]
